Description: Triangular handle-ornament from a mould-made pottery lamp, decorated with a bust of Sarapis on a globe. Orange-brown clay, with grog; buff surface colouration or slip. Plaster mould.
Curator's comments: 'British Museum Occasional Paper' xxii, 1981, p.43, fig.13.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q1925)
